id.description: Unique identification string. Useful for constructing tree of rebuilds of the same artifact in the Web UI. Note that it is up to the CI system to implement. Replaces thread_id from previous versions of the spec. The value must be unique among all systems reporting on the artifact; it is advised to prefix it with a unique string, e.g. the name of the CI system, etc.

name.description: A human readable name of the pipeline.

runtime.description: The runtime in seconds of the pipeline.
